casebody.data:
[Cite as 04/21/2003 Case Announcements, 2003-Ohio-1982.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

April 21, 2003

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2002-0740. Purvis v. Cincinnati Ins. Co.

Greene App. No. 2001CA104, 2002-Ohio-1803. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal and cross-appeal from the Court of Appeals for Greene County. Upon consideration of appellants/crossappellees’ motion to consolidate this case with Supreme Court case Nos. 2002-0610 and 2002-0850 for purposes of oral argument,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion fails for want of four votes on the following vote:

Moyer, C.J., Lundberg Stratton and O’Connor, JJ., vote to deny. F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., vote to grant. Resnicic and Cook, JJ., not participating.
